clusters.esrs_extract: Product Lifecycle Management: TC‑SC‑410 a .1 Percentage of products by revenue that contain IEC2474 declarable substances. Samsung Electronics complies with EU RoHS, REACH, TSCA, etc. Pages1 and3. Product Lifecycle Management: TC‑HW‑410a.2 Percentage of eligible products that meet the EPEAT registration criteria or equivalent: Computers5.5%, Mobile phones5.3%, Tablets6.7%, Displays2.0%. Product Lifecycle Management: TC‑HW‑410a.3 Percentage of eligible products that meet the ENERGY STAR® criteria: Audio devices0.6%, Computers00%, Tablets1.6%. Product Safety: TC‑H0W‑2 a .1 Description of the approach to identifying and addressing data security risks in products. Samsung Electronics performs a control tower role through the Global Privacy Team Head as Chief Privacy Officer and Information Security Center Head as Chief Information Security Officer, who oversee the Privacy Steering Committee and the Security Council. Product Lifecyle Management: TC‑HW‑410a.4 Weight of end‑of‑life products and e‑waste recovered, percentage recycled. Samsung Electronics selected an e‑waste collection system as a key initiative; the system will expand to all global sales countries by 2030. Pages6‑17,9, and3.
